solution_line_template: He buys a plain croissant for ${plain_croissant_cost} and an almond croissant for ${almond_croissant_cost} for a total of ${plain_croissant_cost} + ${almond_croissant_cost} = $<<{plain_croissant_cost}+{almond_croissant_cost}={weekend_pastry_cost}>>{weekend_pastry_cost} on pastries per weekend
In one year, which is {weeks_in_year} weeks, he spends {weeks_in_year}*${weekend_pastry_cost} = $<<{weeks_in_year}*{weekend_pastry_cost}={total_annual_cost}>>{total_annual_cost} on pastries
